Row.Text: Can only have 1 City. Towns cannot use Convert to City. Receive Culture and Science in all Settlements when pillaging Improvements equal to a percentage of the HP or Yields gained.

[LIST][LI]Can only have 1 City. Towns cannot use [B]Convert to City[/B].[LI]Receive [B][icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture[/B] and [B][icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science[/B] in all [B]Settlements [/B]when pillaging equal to [B]25% of the yield or HP gained[/B][LI][B]+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Trelleborg[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Vikings's associated Wonder.
